attributes.action: Call a General Election with immediate effect.
attributes.additional_details: This is against the will of the People and it appears that Parliament no longer respects the will of the People and our self serving Politicians are no longer representing us. I therefore Petition that a General Election be called at the earliest opportunity so we can publicly oust these self serving so called Political elite who obviously believe they know better than the people they are meant to serve.
attributes.background: Today the 29 January 2019, 318 MP's in our so called democratic Parliament voted against the prospect of a "No Deal Brexit".  I therefore Petition that a General Election be called at the earliest opportunity.
